This page will be used to add updated resources as we receive them. Communications from the Superintendent's office will also be included here. If necessary educational resources and helpful links will be organized in this area.
Field Trips: All field trips have been cancelled or postponed. Your school administrator will be sharing school specific information with you in the coming weeks.

RSD 13 will offer grab and go lunches on Monday and Thursday of each week between the hours of 11:00 a.m.-11:30 am. This will continue for the duration of the COVID-19 school closure The grab and go lunch bag will include lunch for multiple days offering a variety of cold sandwiches, fruit, vegetables, chips and milk.

The pick-up location is outside of the CRHS cafeteria. Students/Guardians can drive through the student drop-off/pickup-up circle. Please be prepared to give your student ID number or your name to complete the transaction.

You can order ahead using this Grab and Go Pre-Order Form. Orders must be received by 8:30 AM of the pickup day.
For questions please contact Kim Neubig, Director of Finance at kneubig@rsd13.org.
